casebody.data:
Danny BROWN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 28, 2018

James E. Mortimer, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Theresa Anne Ferryman, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Danny Brown's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 358, 179 A.3d 794 (2018), is denied.
